text: John Rambo is a fictional character from the Rambo media franchise. He first appeared in the 1972 novel First Blood by David Morrell, before appearing in the series of movies First Blood (1982), Rambo: First Blood Part II (1985), Rambo III (1988) and Rambo IV (2008). ==Portrayals== He has been portrayed in the movies by Sylvester Stallone and in Mortal Kombat 11 with Stallone returning. == References == Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1970s Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional war veterans Category:Movie characters
title: John Rambo
